code: import React,{useState}from'react';import NodeManager from'./nodemanager';import MinerManager from'./MinerManager';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[page,setPage]=useState('mining');const[network,setNetwork]=useState("mainnet");return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Ergo Mining Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{style:{margin:"1em 0"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setPage('mining'),style:{marginRight:12},children:"Mining Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setPage('node'),children:"Node Manager"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{style:{marginLeft:24},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setNetwork("mainnet"),style:{background:network==="mainnet"?"#0078ff":"#222",color:"#fff",marginRight:6},children:"Mainnet"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setNetwork("testnet"),style:{background:network==="testnet"?"#e38a00":"#222",color:"#fff"},children:"Testnet"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{children:[page==='mining'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MinerManager,{network:network}),page==='node'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NodeManager,{network:network,setNetwork:setNetwork})]})]});}export default App;
